casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joseph Burton MIAL 17P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Mr. Joseph Burton Mial, for Mial, Joseph Burton Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Raleigh, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Mr. J. Douglas Henderson, Greensboro, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of January 2018 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
